text:
<@UJE5LARL0> growth engineer ^ is a great shout - or product management which requires a lot of top-level knowledge about the bigger picture of both development and marketing IMO.

If I had more engineering time at my disposal I’d use it for building tools (could be user facing or internal), helping with data-driven content (data science), or improving marketing implementation where third-party tools just don’t cut it any more… for example, custom logic for automated emails (like what Unsplash do with their amazing customised emails).
